title: Bond of the Lycaon Concubine
description: Raina grew up with the faint memories of her grandmother’s fairytales. Tales that told her she was a part of something far greater than her lonely nomadic life gave existence to. But when she finds she’s been among the one thing she desired most, can she let go of her more human-raising to submit to it?Tristan has had a wild hunger for the saucy minx ever since she started working at the Hell hound Tavern. When a close call with a rival pack meant risking exposing the beast he was to Raina, he wasn’t expecting her to submit to the beast as his mate. As the Beta to the pack Alpha, Tristan can’t keep a mate to himself, but the secret she holds says otherwise.But keeping a Lycaon Concubine might mean leaving the pack in order to protect his Alpha, who’s status has kept a pack 500 strong safe for generations.
author: Talon P.S.
